name: jsonhint-ts
description: Extension to display resolved token values from JSON with full resolution chain, compatible with Tokens Studio logic.

scripts.build-all: npm install && npm run build && vsce package

jsonhintTs.tooltipBackgroundColor.description: Background color for token tooltip view.

jsonhintTs.tooltipTextColor.description: Text color for token tooltip view.

jsonhintTs.tooltipFontSize.description: Font size for token tooltip view.

jsonhintTs.tooltipAnimationDuration.description: Animation duration (fade-in) for token tooltip view.

jsonhintTs.showIcons.description: Show icons for token types in hover.

jsonhintTs.showArrows.description: Show arrows between tokens in inheritance chain.

jsonhintTs.complexTypes.description: List of token types treated as complex (rendered as tables).

jsonhintTs.noisyTokens.description: List of tokens to exclude from the inheritance chain (noisy tokens).

jsonhintTs.maxChainLength.description: Maximum chain depth displayed in hover tooltips.

jsonhintTs.maxSuggestions.description: Limit number of completion suggestions to avoid UI lag.

jsonhintTs.allowNoDollar.description: If true, the extension will recognize tokens defined without a leading '$'.
